Package PresentationLayer

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdminItemList
    Class that gets a List of all items from database and sets attribute for view on adminItemList.jsp
    AdminItemListDB
    Class that takes requests from adminItemList.jsp and choose witch query through LogicFacade to
    populate, and thereafter return updated Item List to jsp page.
    AdminMeasurementUnits
    Class that gets a List of all measurements from database and sets attribute for view on adminMeasurementUnits.jsp
    AdminMeasurementUnitsDB
    Class that takes requests from adminMeasurementUnits.jsp and choose witch query through LogicFacade to
    populate, and thereafter return updated measurement list to jsp page.
    AdminRafterSpacing
    Class that gets a List of all rafter spacing from database and sets attribute for view on adminRafterSpacing.jsp
    AdminRafterSpacingDB
    Class that takes requests from adminRafterSpacing.jsp and choose witch query through LogicFacade to
    populate, and thereafter return updated rafterSpacing list to jsp page.
    AdminReceipt
    AdminReceipt will change status on a quote to "Godkend" while printing a receipt for the customer
    AdminRejectQuote
    AdminRejectQuote will delete a customer quote using a user proposition id
    AdminRoof
    Class that gets a List of all roof materials from database and sets attribute for view on adminRoof.jsp
    AdminRoofDB
    Class that takes requests from adminRoof.jsp and choose witch query through LogicFacade to
    populate, and thereafter return updated roof list to jsp page.
    AdminRoofPitch
    Class that gets a List of all roof pitch and factor from database and sets attribute for
    view on adminRoofPitch.jsp
    AdminRoofPitchDB
    Class that takes requests from adminRoofPitch.jsp and choose witch query through LogicFacade to
    populate, and thereafter return updated roofPitch list to jsp page.
    AdminStandardDimensions
    Class that gets a List of all standard dimensions from database and sets attribute for
    view on adminStandardDimensions.jsp
    AdminStandardDimensionsDB
    Class that takes requests from adminStandardDimensions.jsp and update through LogicFacade
    and thereafter return updated standard dimension list to jsp page.
    CarportCalcPage
    Class that takes a user proposition and insert into user quote and order quote through LogicFacade.
    CarportCustomize
    CarportCustomize is used to get values from the database and populate select option
    on customerCarportCustomize.jsp
    Drawing
    Drawing class will show a table of a item list on the current order and show the blueprints of carport + shed
    EditItemList
    The purpose of EditItemList is to be able to update the quantity of items from the item list
    FrontController
    Class that process request for both GET and POST methods
    Login
    The purpose of Login is to have a user role before you can access the admin page
    QuoteView
    QuoteView is used to populate info fields with user quote information on adminQuoteView.jsp
    Redirect
    Redirect helps with managing the navigation of the site while not having to make a java class and form for each link
    Register
    Register will add a new customer to the database, using email and password
    RejectQuote
    RejectQuote will reject and delete a customer quote using a user proposition id
    ReturnAdmin
    The ReturnAdmin class makes sure the proposition list is updated when returning to adminpage.jsp from adminQuoteView.jsp
    UnknownCommand
    Customized exception handling for errors
    UpdateQuoteOrder
    UpdateQuoteOrder will update the current order while updating adminQuoteView.jsp
    UpdateQuotePrice
    UpdateQuoteUser will update prices in the current quote/proposition while updating adminQuoteView.jsp
    UpdateQuoteUser
    UpdateQuoteUser will update the currently viewed user info while updating the jsp site
